title: Task 1: Describe visual or contextual characteristic of a work of art.

descriptions: Response describes ONE function of the Kaaba within the context of Islam.

title: Task 2: Describes a contextual element of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use any examples of specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain ONE way in which a practitioner of Islam is intended to interact with the Kaaba in Mecca.

title: Task 3: Explains how context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content and/or function.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use specific CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain why the physical site is important for understanding the significance of the Kaaba.
Accurately uses CONTEXTUAL evidence to explain ONE reason why the physical site is important for understanding the significance of the Kaaba.
